profile_desc: A profile picture helps personalize your account

security.change_pwd_desc: Your choice to change your password is a proactive step towards fortifying your account against unauthorised access. A robust password is your first line of defense, and crafting a strong one significantly enhances your online safety.
security.pwd_changed_successfully: Your password has been changed successfully

roles_access.data_sharing_desc: Configurations that determine the user's data access privileges

my_app.my_apps_desc: In this section, you can effortlessly manage your apps and customize your experience. Review your app list, set defaults for web and mobile.

notifications.notification_desc: Effortlessly manage your assets with personalised notifications. Tailor your alerts to keep you informed about crucial updates in your portfolio.

apiclient.name: Name
apiclient.apiclient_desc: Enhance system interaction efficiency with our API Client, ensuring seamless access to functionalities and data through streamlined request handling. Simplify the integration process, allowing users to interact with the system effortlessly and access the full range of capabilities with ease.
